questions.quote: Oh, by marriage.  We went to their wedding. You should have heard him talking about Chappaquiddick - trying to blame the whole thing on bad directions.
Well, I don't keep pecans in the house so I didn't think it'd be a problem.
Well, sorry I missed that, uh, charity thing. But this was one of those truly glorious Hampton weekends that you always hear about.
Hey, did I tell you I called one of those girls from the personal ads in The Daily Worker?
Uh.. ah,  Oh, nothing - nothing.. No, I certainly don't have any stories, if that's what you're implying.
What's so hard about that? How am I supposed to get it in there? I can't just walk in with it. I have to get the Rosses out of the apartment!
You wanna know what happened to Kramer? I'll tell you what happened to Kramer. He was ticked off. About the keys. Yeah, that's right - about the keys. Thought he got a bad rap.
Actually, I was thinking of donating a large portion of it to charity.
"Yeah! They isolate the muscles. The muscle has to grow....or die."
Oh ho! Class, huh? At Columbia? Let me tell you something, pal. I called the registrar's office. I checked you out. They have no record of a Ray Thomas at that school! You liar!
